    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">These terms don't apply to our PayMe app. PayMe has its own terms which you will agree to when you accept that app. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">There may also be separate terms that apply to certain products or services that we supply to you. You'll need to agree to additional, separate terms for these products or services. We'll give you any relevant terms when you need them.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We also have a privacy policy and cookie notice and you can find these on our website. These notices apply to the personal data we collect via Online and Mobile Banking. We take your privacy seriously.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Sometimes we'll offer or show third party products or services through Online and Mobile Banking. If something goes wrong with these products or services, or you're not happy with them, we might put you directly in contact with that third party.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may have to pay tax for using Online and Mobile Banking. You'll need to get your own tax, legal or other professional advice about the products and services you buy through Online or Mobile Banking. <br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We hope that we are always able to resolve issues between us. If we can't and we end up going to court, the laws of Hong Kong S.A.R. will apply to the interpretation of all of the terms between us. Any disputes that go to court would go to the courts of Hong Kong S.A.R. However, if you or your assets are located in another country/region, the courts of that country/region may hear the dispute.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We'll only transfer our rights and obligations under these terms to another member of the HSBC group or someone else we think is able to perform our obligations towards you as well as we would. We'll let you know in advance if this happens.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Sometimes one of the HSBC group companies might need to act for us under these terms.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Joint account holders both have to comply with everything in these terms.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">When we talk about 'we' 'us' or 'our' we mean The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For our mobile banking app, the app stores have asked us to remind you that we, not app stores, are responsible for our mobile banking app. You should contact us about:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>maintenance and support issues, or anything to do with our app's content,</li> 
 <li>any malfunction of our app,</li> 
 <li>any claims relating to our app.</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">App stores are considered as third party beneficiaries while you're using our app, and they can rely on the above terms in the same way as we can.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We won't be responsible for any issues caused by third party services or software, for example instant messaging or video chat apps, etc. used with our accounts or services whether because of a delay in processing information or other issues unless:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">

 <li>such issues are caused by our mistake.</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We won't be responsible for any issues caused by any delay in acting on instructions, information or communication via Online or Mobile Banking where this is caused by events outside of our reasonable control.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We'll only be responsible for loss in connection with Online or Mobile Banking if:<br> </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>it was caused because we, or someone acting for us, acted negligently (this basically means where we didn't take proper care where we should have done) or fraudulently (this basically means being deceitful); or</li> 
 <li>we failed to do something we agreed to do in these terms, and the resulting loss you suffered was of a type and amount we could have expected as a result of those actions or failures. There are other places in these terms where we say we're not responsible for any losses – this is always subject to the above unless we say otherwise.</li> 
</ul>
